channel.title: Cole1497's email
channel.description: Was set to care@care.care because I forgot to change it. I emailed admin@moparisthebest but haven't gotten a reply, but somehow my friend changed my old password to what he thought was going to be his.

item.title: Cole1497's email
item.dc:creator: @carecarecare carecarecare
item.description:
@carecarecare wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:2, topic:410559”]hurr durr im so special I am exempt from making multiple accounts because i’m ignorant.
Just message an admin on irc and they’ll change your email for you, Mopman will be bound to be able to take your request.[/quote]

implying I haven’t done this
If you honestly have that big of a problem that you’re crapping yourself in anger go ahead and report me.

Read full topic
